name: azf-svarut
description: Azure function that queues SvarUT sending

scripts.dev: func start && echo 'If you have Docker installed, run "npm run dev-db" to start local DB.'
scripts.dev-db: docker run --name svarut-mongodb -p 27017:27017 -v $PWD/data/db:/data/db --rm -d mongo && echo 'Connect with "mongodb://localhost:27017/svarut"'

author: Mats Andreassen <mats.andreassen@vtfk.no>
